author: Special Correspondent
text:
Post offices have so far booked about 8,000 online orders for supply of Kumbakonam Mahamaham prasadams .

The postal department had tied up with the Hindu Religious and Charitable Endowments Board for the service.

The facility is still available at 1,626 branch post offices in the Chennai city region wherein customers can pay Rs.150 to book a parcel comprising holy water from Mahamaham tank and prasadams from 17 temples in Kumbakonam.
title: Over 8,000 orders placed for Mahamaham prasadam
